metadata.title: CVE-2022-27943 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description: libiberty/rust-demangle.c in GNU GCC 11.2 allows stack consumption indemangle_const, as demonstrated by nm-new.

criterions.comment: gcc-8-cross package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-snapshot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
gcc-arm-none-eabi package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-avr package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-h8300-hms package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-m68hc1x package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-mingw-w64 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-msp430 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-opt package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
